thing-type.description: CO Sensor with acoustic alarm<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThis product is a Smart Carbon Monoxide Sensor and adopts super low power consumption Z-Wave wireless network technology, used for detecting carbon monoxide. Sensor adopts high performance eloctrochemical sensor, supports sound and flash alarm. It has high stability, super low power consumption, little sensitivity drift and many other features.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gt Press the Net_Button 3 times within 1.5s, Green LED is blinking 3 times within 1 second.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gt Press the Net_Button 3 times within 1.5s</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtEvery 24h by default</p&gt
